# Pull Request

## Description
Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Also include relevant motivation and context.

## Type of change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] docs (documentation update)
- [ ] style (formatting, missing semi-colons, etc.)
- [ ] refactor (code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature)
- [ ] perf (performance improvement)
- [ ] chore (maintenance)

## How Has This Been Tested?
Describe the tests that you ran. Provide instructions so we can reproduce. Include any relevant details:
- Steps:
- Commands:

## Checklist
- [ ] I ran `shellcheck` locally or rely on CI to pass
- [ ] I updated documentation (README/CHANGELOG) where applicable
- [ ] I verified configs load in Sway (`swaymsg reload`) where applicable
- [ ] I have linked the related issue(s) if any
